entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 124,418,000 reported in the network role https://www.valamar.com/role/BalanceSheet should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 124,418,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role https://www.valamar.com/role/ChangesinEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : HRK Decimals of TreasuryShares : -1 Decimals of Equity : -1 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900DUWS1DGNEK4C68/2021-12-31/ESEF/HR/0/Valamar_Riviera_dionicko_drustvo_za_turizam_hrv_2021.zip/Valamar_Riviera_dionicko_drustvo_za_turizam_hrv_2021/reports/HRV Godisnje izvjesce 2021 Final.xhtml 373693
